scripts.test: cd packages/sdk-react-native && pnpm test && cd ../sdk-web && pnpm test
scripts.publish-native-test: turbo run build --filter=@orga-ai/react-native && cd packages/sdk-react-native && pnpm publish --access private --tag test
scripts.publish-web-test: turbo run build --filter=@orga-ai/sdk-web && cd packages/sdk-web && pnpm publish --access private --tag test
scripts.publish-native-alpha: turbo run build --filter=@orga-ai/react-native && cd packages/sdk-react-native && pnpm publish --access private --tag alpha
scripts.publish-web-alpha: turbo run build --filter=@orga-ai/sdk-web && cd packages/sdk-web && pnpm publish --access private --tag alpha
